{"id":252120838,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 4 months","timestamp":1565946799,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/252120838/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"8.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        int a[32]= {0};\n        for(int i=0;i<32;i++){\n            if( (1 << i) & n){\n                a[i] = 1;\n            }\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        int pos = 31;\n        for(int i=0;i<32;i++){\n            if(a[i]){\n                ans += pow(2,pos);\n            }\n            pos--;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits"}
